lines.text: Maybe he tried- but that fire was blocking the door!
If he moved too late, and tried to escape through the fire... that might be how he caught fire in the first place.
Hm... could be. But there's a couple things wrong with that.
First, the body's not in the doorway or anything- it's off to the side.
If he tried to push through the fire, would he really recoil from it like that, and end up over there?
I mean, it's possible- even if it would've been smarter to keep moving, he might not have been thinking clearly.
Maybe, but there's one other thing.
Which is that, judging by the scorch marks, the fire <c=#FF00FF>didn't</c> block the door.
So I guess it had to be something else, then.
